snippet: Coco Crisp homered for the third consecutive game as Oakland defeated Texas and pulled into a tie with them atop the American League West.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Oakland Athletics defeat Texas Rangers, 4-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Coco Crisp homered for the third consecutive game as Oakland defeated Texas and pulled into a tie with them atop the American League West.

headline.main: A’s Catch Rangers in A.L. West
headline.print_headline: A’s Catch Rangers In A.L. West
